description.en: Summon a player to you (No casting time). This item only works on characters on the same continent or in the same instance.
description.ar: Summon a player to you (No casting time). This item only works on characters on the same continent or in the same instance.
description.br: Invoca um jogador para você (Sem tempo de conjuração). Este item só funciona em personagens que estão no mesmo continente ou na mesma instância.
description.cns: 没有等待时间，可以马上召唤朋友到身边的晶球
description.de: Eine Perle die einen Freund zu sich ruft. (30 Sekunden Beschwörungsdauer)
description.fi: Summon a player to you (No casting time). This item only works on characters on the same continent or in the same instance.
description.fil: Summon a player to you (No casting time). This item only works on characters on the same continent or in the same instance.
description.fr: Parchemin invoquant instantanément l'un de vos amis à vos côtés.
description.id: Panggil pemain kepadamu (Tidak ada waktu casting). Item ini hanya berfungsi pada karakter di benua yang sama atau di instance yang sama.
description.it: Summon a player to you (No casting time). This item only works on characters on the same continent or in the same instance.
description.jp: 友達をこの場へ呼び出してくれる神秘のオーブ。同じ大陸でのみ使用できます。(待機時間なし)
description.nl: Summon a player to you (No casting time). This item only works on characters on the same continent or in the same instance.
description.pl: Summon a player to you (No casting time). This item only works on characters on the same continent or in the same instance.
description.ru: Переносит к вам выбранного игрока. Применяется моментально.
description.sp: Invoca a un jugador hacia ti (Sin tiempo de lanzamiento). Este objeto solo funciona en personajes del mismo continente o de la misma instancia.
description.sw: Summon a player to you (No casting time). This item only works on characters on the same continent or in the same instance.
description.th: เรียกผู้เล่นมาหาคุณ (ไม่มีเวลาร่าย) ไอเท็มนี้ใช้ได้เฉพาะกับตัวละครในทวีปเดียวกันหรือในกรณีเดียวกัน
description.tw: 召喚玩家到你身旁，被召喚的玩家須和你在同一大陸或同一分流。(須對象同意召喚、不須詠唱)
description.vi: Triệu tập một người chơi cho bạn (Không có thời gian). Mục này chỉ hoạt động trên các nhân vật trên cùng một lục địa hoặc trong cùng một trường hợp.
